Break2Name: Banana Cocktail With Almonds and Cinnamon

Description: Peel orange and pear, cut into pieces. Peel banana, slice it. Peel avocado, mince using fork and mix with lemon juice and mint. Mix fruits and pour avocado muss on it.
Ingredients:
150g Banana,
	130g Pear,
	150g Orange,
	40g Avocado,
	20g Lemon,
	2g Herbs

Description: Pour hot water on oats, leave it for 10 minutes. Blend oats with peach, peeled banana and almond milk. Enjoy.

Break2Name: Dessert with Raisins, Yogurt and Mandarine
Description: Peel mandarine, cut into pieces. Cut nuts. Mix raisins, mandarine pieces, nuts and yogurt. Pour it with honey.
Ingredients:
120g Mandarine,
	24g Nuts,
	30g Raisins,
	10g Honey,
	90g Natural Yogurt

Description: 1. Peel the carrot and grate 2. Cut the orange in half and hollow the pulp. Remove white pellets and cut finely. 3. Mix orange with carrot and olive oil 4. You can serve in halved orange halves
Ingredients:
220 g (2 large pieces) Carrot,
	480 g (2 pieces) Orange,
	10 g (1 tbsp) Olive Oil

Break2Name: Cottage Cheese with Yogurt, Banana, Honey and Oats
Description: 1. Mix cottage cheese with yogurt, honey and oats. 2. Add sliced banana and mix
Ingredients:
185 g (1 medium) Banana
	120 g (4 slices) Cottage cheese
	75 g (½ pack of 150 g) Natural yogurt
	4 g (1 tbsp) Oats 
	5 g (1 tbsp) Honey

Description: 1. Chop the onion finely 2. Avocado slice in half, remove the pome, hollow the pulp with a spoon and then mash with a fork 3. Combine the ingredients, add two tablespoons of lemon juice (or lime) 4. Spread the paste on whole-grain bread
Ingredients:
105 g (3 slices) Whole wheat bread 
	70 g (½ pcs) Avocado 
	25 g (0,2 pcs) Onion 
	20 g (¼ pcs.) Lemon 
	2 g (1 pinch) Spices

Break2Name: Banana Orange Coctail with Cinnamon and Ginger
Description:
1. Squeeze the juice from the orange, cut the banana into thick slices
2. Pour the juice and almond milk into the blender, add the banana,
cinnamon and ginger. Blend all ingredients.
Ingredients:
240 g (1 pc) Orange
	200 g (0.9 cup) Almond Milk
	170 g Banana
	5 g (2 1/2 pinches) Herbs

Description:
1. Peel the avocado and remove the seed.
2. Wash the spinach
3. Mix all the ingredients
4. If necessary, add half a glass of water
5. Optionally - add juice squeezed from a half of lemon.
Ingredients:
210 g Pineapple
	140 g Avocado
	100 Spinach fresh or frozen

Break2Name: Tofu Cheese with Chickpeas and Pepper
Description: 1. Mash tofu with fork, add yogurt and mix. 2. Add chopped peppers and chickpeas and mix. 3. Eat with bread.
Ingredients:
220 g Tofu
	80 g Natural Yogurt
	30 g Chickpeas
	120 g Pepper
	35 g Whole Meal Bread

Description: 1. Wash, peel and cut avocado. 2. Mix together with kefir, oats, parsley and lemon juice.
Ingredients:
45 g Avocado
	150 g Natural Kefir
	14 g Oats
	480 g Lemon

Break2Name: Vegan Watermelon&Banana Shake with Chia Seeds
Description: 1. Wash fruits. 2. Place peeled watermelon, banana and almond milk into blender. 3. Mix all the ingredients. 4. Add chia seeds into blender. Blend again. 5. Shake is ready. You can also put it aside and wait until shake will get thicker.
Ingredients:
220 g Almond Milk
	150 g Watermelon
	90 g Banana
	20 g Chia Seeds

Break2Name: Nut Cream with Couscous and Pear
Description: 1. Put a boiled almond milk over couscous and leave to swell. 2. Grate the pear and mix with couscous. 3. Sprinkle with nuts.
Ingredients:
6 g Nuts
	39 g Couscous
	170 g Pear
	220 g Almond Milk
